main event: A UFO was sighted over Plattsburg, New York on 9 April 1955.
interesting points: The object exhibited erratic motion and changed colors from red to white to yellow-orange., The object was reported to hover and move backwards., A blast was heard coming from the bottom of the object., The sighting was corroborated by civilian naval personnel in the area., The observation period lasted approximately 30 minutes.
witness description: Civilian observer with naval personnel support in the area.
